Game.Name: Titan (Japan)
Game.plot: Titan is an Action game, developed and published by Sofel, which was released in Japan in 1990.http://www.gamefaqs.com/console/nes/home/579665.htmlCheat: Extra 15 Lives and Start Level 80On Player 1's controller, hold A, B, Down, Select, and Start, then also hold A and B on Player 2's controller. Reset the console and release all buttons to be able to begin a game on Level 80 with fifteen additional lives.Cheat: Bonus GameEnter this password at the regular password entry screen to play a really weird bonus game.
Game.Notes: Titan is an Action game, developed and published by Sofel, which was released in Japan in 1990.
